A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I signed up for the first time just so that I could rate this movie.  As a child of the 70s\, I've grown up with the Star Wars franchise.  So sad to see it faltering this way.  For the record\, I've loved episodes II - VI (Episode I was OK).  However\, I was sorely disappointed with this and The Force Awakens.  I've agreed with many of audience criticisms already posted here\, so no need for me to rehash them.  I just wanted to add to the chorus and state that I too don't plan to waste money in the theater to watch the next one.
